name: Big Club
description: Equipped unit gets +4/0/-1 and takes 1 damage whenever it attacks

name: Wizard's Tower
description: Traversable. Activated abilities of wizards in this tile cost 2 less to activate. When an occupying friendly unit is destroyed in this tile, destroy this as well
